If the player enters a cavern that contains the pit, then the player dies and the game is over.

Create 3x3 grid
!|PlayerFalls|
|width|height|
|3|3|


* Map Layout
 
{{{	  
(0,2) (1,2) (2,2)
(0,1) (1,1) (2,1)	
(0,0) (1,0) (2,0)
}}}


* Use 9 caverns
!|script|PlayerFalls|
|cavern|0||0|
|cavern|1||0|
|cavern|2||0|
|cavern|0||1|
|cavern|1||1|
|cavern|2||1|
|cavern|0||2|
|cavern|1||2|
|cavern|2||2|

!|script|
|put|player|in cavern|1|1|
|put|pit|in cavern|0|0|
|enter command|S|
|check|message|Available Directions N, W, E.|was printed|true|
|enter command|W|
|check|message|You fell to your death.|was printed|true|
|check|message|Game over.|was printed|true|
|check|game terminated|true|
